channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Black Friday : Fnac et Darty liquident leurs stocks en ce vendredi noir
item.description: C’est le top départ du Black Friday : l’occasion pour faire de bonnes affaires, notamment chez la Fnac et Darty qui lâchent une tonne de promotions sur leurs sites. Retrouvez dans cet article toutes les offres qui valent le coup en temps réel.

item.title: Black Friday TV OLED et QLED : des promotion en pagaille sur toute la journée
item.description: Le Black Friday est le point d'orgue des réductions en tout genre. Vous êtes à la recherche d'un tout nouveau téléviseur. TV OLED, QLED ou Mini-LED voici une compilation des meilleures promotions disponibles.

item.title: Amazon's Black Friday sale LIVE: 141 deals I'm shopping from Apple, Ninja, Kindle, PlayStation, and more
item.description: It's officially Black Friday – here is your guide to Amazon's Black Friday sale, with today's 151 best deals on TVs, AirPods, Kindle, appliances, laptops, and more.

item.title: Black Friday smartphone : c’est le moment où jamais d’acheter ! Voici les offres immanquables pour iOS et Android
item.description: C'est le jour J ! Le Black Friday bat son plein avec des milliers d'offres chez les e-commerçants. Nous avons réuni les meilleures promotions sur les différentes smartphones. Il y en a pour tous les prix et tous les usages.

item.title: The 85 best Walmart Black Friday deals from $8 – MacBooks, TVs, PS5, air fryers, Lego, and more
item.description: Walmart's Black Friday sale is live, and I'm rounding up today's 85 best deals from $8, featuring MacBooks, Lego, TVs, air fryers, PS5, and more.

item.title: 67 Best Buy Black Friday deals I wouldn't miss – 60% off Apple, PlayStation, OLED TVs, and more
item.description: Best Buy's Black Friday sale is filled with thousands of deals - I've found the 85 best, featuring 60% off Apple, PlayStation, OLED TVs, and more.

item.title: Anduril’s autonomous weapons stumble in tests and combat, WSJ reports
item.description: Defense tech startup Anduril Industries has faced numerous setbacks during testing of its autonomous weapons systems, according to new reporting by the WSJ. The problems cited include more than a dozen drone boats that failed during a Navy exercise off California in May, with sailors warning of safety violations and potential loss of life; a […]

item.title: The 151+ best Black Friday tech deals live: expert picks from Amazon, Apple, Walmart, Best Buy, and more
item.description: Your Black Friday deals guide on tech products has arrived - shop our expert picks on TVs, Apple devices, smart home gadgets, laptops, headphones, and more.

item.title: Le véritable Black Friday commence enfin : voici le TOP 50 des meilleures offres pour le jour-j
item.description: Entre les offres en avant-première, les promos du 11.11 ou encore la Black Week, le mois de novembre a été assez mouvementé en offres. Mais, ce n'est pas fini : le Black Friday débute officiellement ce vendredi avec de nouvelles offres dans sa besace. Nous avons fait le tri des meilleures promotions Tech, faites vous plaisir !

item.title: The best Black Friday deals under $25: Apple AirTag, Echo Pop, Fire TV Stick
item.description: Stumped on a gift exchange idea? We found solid Black Friday deals under $25 like AirTags, Echo Pop speakers, and Fire TV Sticks.

item.title: 160+ Amazon Black Friday deals: Score best-ever deals on AirPods, Kindles, Legos, and Fire TVs
item.description: Amazon Black Friday 2025 is already underway, and you can buy Fire TVs starting at $99. Shop record prices on Kindle, Bose, Lego, and Apple products.

item.title: 100+ Black Friday deals: We found record-low prices on AirPods, MacBooks, Samsung TVs, Kindles, and Ninja
item.description: Get the best Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Live updates on the latest deals from Amazon, Target, Walmart, and more
item.description: Get live updates on Black Friday sales. We found savings of $150 on Dyson Supersonic hair dryers, $300 off Samsung TVs, and record prices on AirPods.
